title: 227 - You'll Never Make Your Best Work While Believing This Lie
description:
The mindset you approach your creative work with determines so much of the outcome, so it's super important that you have a healthy approach to your creativity.

Hollywood hasn't helped much on this front. There are hundreds of movies that perpetuate unhelpful creative stereotypes.

In this episode I want to address one of the most toxic creative myths plaguing creatives today. My hope is that this will help you establish a new perspective that will unleash your best creative work to date!!

CREDITS

Support Creative Pep Talk on Patreon: www.patreon.com/creativepeptalk

Thanks to Chris Graham from the Six Figure Home Studio Podcast for hosting!
https://itunes.apple.com/podcast/id1304699450?mt=2&ls=1

Thanks to Yoni Wolf and the band WHY? for our theme music.

Thanks to Alex Sugg for editing and the podcast!
www.alexsugg.com
